bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Lawyer, Secretary of the Navy (1841); U.S. Senator from North Carolina (1846-1855); resident of Raleigh (Wake County) and New Bern (Craven County), N.C.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Personal and business letters. Most letters are to Thomas Mandeville Carlisle concerning family and business matters, especially a disagreement between the Postmaster General and the railroads. A letter to R.B. Temple refers to Zachary Taylor's election. Also includes a commonplace book of Frances L. Badger containing original poetry.
